com.snakybo.torch.component

Class Renderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.object.TorchObject
      • com.snakybo.torch.object.Component
        • com.snakybo.torch.component.Renderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeshRenderer

    public abstract class Renderer
extends Component

    Base renderer class, all renderers should extend this class to get full functionality.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
